additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Water, Sugar, Thickened Cream [Cream (Milk), Mineral Salts (450, Sodium Carbonates), Thickener (400)], Mixed Berries (6%) [Raspberry, Strawberry, Blueberry, Blackberry], Wheat Flour, Milk Powder, Margarine [Palm Oil**, Water, Emulsifiers (Soy Lecithin, 471), Salt, Preservative (202), Natural Flavouring, Acidity Regulator (330), Natural Colour (Carotene), Antioxidant (307b (Soy))], Modified Starch (1442, 1422), Egg, Whipping Agent [Glucose Syrup, Palm Kernel Oil**, Emulsifiers (471, 472a), Sodium Caseinate (Milk), Stabiliser (340), Anticaking Agent (341)], Belgian White Chocolate Flakes (1.5%) [Sugar, Milk Powder, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Natural Vanilla Flavouring], Emulsifiers [Water, Humectants (420, 1520), Emulsifiers (471 (Soy), 475 from Palm**), Acidity Regulator (570)], Natural Vanilla Flavouring, Whey Powder (Milk), Baking Powder [Raising Agents (450, Sodium Carbonates), Wheat Flour], Stabilisers (466, 516, 327), Acidity Regulators (339, 330, 270), Freeze Dried Raspberry Pieces (0.1%), Natural Flavouring, Thickeners (407, 412, 415), Preservative (202), Mineral Salt (450), Emulsifier (401), Natural Colours (Anthocyanins, Carotene), Vanilla Bean Paste.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Walnut, Contains SOY, Contains MILK, Contains EGG, Contains Gluten, May Be Present SESAME, Contains Wheat

description: Mixed berry coulis, layered with smooth vanilla custard, sponge cake and vanilla bean mousse, hand finished with Belgian white chocolate flakes and freeze dried raspberries
name: Classic Summer Berry Trifle
